programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs rīko nakšņošanu saviem mazbērniem, bet Heilija meklē izeju. Klēra mēģina sagādāt Filam perfektu jubilejas dāvanu. Mičels un Kamerons atklāj, ka viņu draudzene ir traka un greizsirdīga uz viņu meitu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils un Klēra atceļ Ziemassvētkus saviem bērniem - viņiem jāatzīstas mājās pieļautajos pārkāpumos. Džejs vilcinās atzīt Glorijas un Menija svētku tradīcijas. Mičels un Kamerons aizved Liliju satikt Ziemassvētku vecīti.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marija nevēlas, lai Roberts paliktu viens, tāpēc viņa uz Ameriku uzaicina Stefāniju. Taču - viņa atbrauc kopā ar savu tēvu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kad Rejs iegādājas jaunu, augstākās klases putekļsūcēju, Debra nolemj to aizvest uz Marijas mājām, meklējot netīrumus.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Filisa stāvvietā sastopas ar virinātāju, un Dvaits steidz pastiprināt drošību. Maikls nolemj ofisa meitenes aizvest uz veiklau, bet patiesībā viņš to dara, lai iegūtu padomu par šķiršanos no Dženas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls izmanto "pludmales dienu" Dunder Mifflin, lai uzzinātu, kurš darbinieks būtu labākais viņa aizstājējs - vien gadījumā, ja viņš saņemtu paaugstinājumu un dotos uz Ņujorku.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Apzinoties, ka Dženna varētu izšķirt prezidenta vēlēšanas, Liza un Džeks sarīko debates, lai iegūtu viņas atbalstu un sekotājus. Kenets vēršas pie Treisija pēc padoma, kā būt informētam vēlētājam, savukārt Pīts mēģina atjaunot 2008. gada vēlēšanu burvību.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks uzzina, ka ļaundaris Treisija jaunajā filmā ir viņa prototips. Liza ļauj Heizelai kļūt par viņas asistenti pēc operācijas, un Dženna cenšas būt atbalstoša un ieklausīties Kenetā.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema sāk savu pirmo šausminoši personīgo saikni kā prātīgs cilvēks ar Felīcijas palīdzību, kurai ir lieli plāni, lai sāktu Semas iepazīšanās dzīvi. Kerola "nejauši" iestāda nelielu šaubu sēklu Britas prātā par Džoelu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema ar maz ticamu sabiedroto gūst uzvaru, nonākot darba intervijā Ņujorkā, lai tikai atklātu, cik biedējoši ir rakstīt skaidrā; noraizējusies, ka viņas meitai vajadzīga palīdzība, Kerola pārkāpj robežu un iepazīstina ar Olīviju.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils un Klēra atceļ Ziemassvētkus saviem bērniem - viņiem jāatzīstas mājās pieļautajos pārkāpumos. Džejs vilcinās atzīt Glorijas un Menija svētku tradīcijas. Mičels un Kamerons aizved Liliju satikt Ziemassvētku vecīti.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Menija tētis ieradies ar ekstravagantām dāvanām. Mičels un Kamerons cīnās par to, kā parūpēties par savu meitu viņas nakts raudāšanas laikā. Klēra mēģina pārsteigt ugunsdzēsējus, kuri reaģēja uz Fila izsaukumu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. Nama stāvus apdzīvo trīs asinsūcēji vampīri – Nandors, Lazlo un Nadja –, enerģijas vampīrs Kolins Robinsons, kurš strādā birojā un ar savu nomācošo klātbūtni izsūc enerģiju saviem kolēģiem, un Giljermo, Nadīnas paziņa. Kā jau kārtīgi vampīri, viņi ir vairākus gadsimtus seni, un iekļaušanās mūsdienu pasaulē tiem nereti sagādā galvassāpes. Otrajā sezonā vampīriem būs jāsaskaras ar zombijiem, raganām, spokiem, slepkavām, interneta troļļiem un citiem mošķiem. Tikmēr Giljermo būs jāizšķiras, vai pašam kļūt par vampīru.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema sāk savu pirmo šausminoši personīgo saikni kā prātīgs cilvēks ar Felīcijas palīdzību, kurai ir lieli plāni, lai sāktu Semas iepazīšanās dzīvi. Kerola "nejauši" iestāda nelielu šaubu sēklu Britas prātā par Džoelu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema ar maz ticamu sabiedroto gūst uzvaru, nonākot darba intervijā Ņujorkā, lai tikai atklātu, cik biedējoši ir rakstīt skaidrā; noraizējusies, ka viņas meitai vajadzīga palīdzība, Kerola pārkāpj robežu un iepazīstina ar Olīviju.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Neviens nešķiet pārsteigts, kad pulkvedis Protero tiek atrasts noslepkavots vietējā draudzē. Apkārt ļoti daudz maldinošas informācijas, īpaši, kad atraitne un viņas mīļākais atzīstas slepkavībā.

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad slavenais Peregrīnas ēkas arhitekts tiek atrasts miris saunā kopā ar cita vīrieša sievu, Peregrīna un Džeims uzskata, ka greizsirdīgais vīrs varētu būt vainojams slepkavībā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pirms prestižās Melburnas suņu izstādes pilsētā notiek aktīva darbība, tomēr kāds skandāls apdraud tā norisi, kad tiek atrasts kāds miris dalībnieks.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gossigntonholas bibliotēkā tiek atrasts blondīnes līķis, Dollija Bentrija zina, ka būs nepieciešama visa iespējamā palīdzība, lai attaisnotu savu vīru Artūru.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza seko bēglim, kurš apsūdzēts slepkavībā. Bēglis ir jāatrod ātrāk par policiju, jo citādi viss tiks zaudēts.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: 1850-tie gadi: bezbailīgā un ziņkārīgā Miss Skārleta vada tēva detektīvaģentūru ar inspektora Velingtona (Hercoga), kalpones Aivijas un Mozus palīdzību.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Attālā Francijas viesnīcā Elīza seko kādam krāpniekam. Viņa uzskata, ka beidzot ir notvērusi Skotlendjarda vismeklētāko noziedznieku. Tomēr arī citi viesnīcas viesi vēlas saņemt solīto atlīdzību.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Detektīvs Albergs izmeklē divu sieviešu noslēpumaino nāvi. Abas tika atrastas mežā dīvainās pozās.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids ierodas Bazulā un iemīlas vīndarītavas īpašniecē. Viņš joprojām ir pensionējies atraitnis, kas bauda dzīvi mierā un klusumā. Tomēr ienaidnieka atgriešanās izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids uzņemas risināt šausminošu slepkavības lietu, kas satricina vietējo pilsētiņu. Terēzai ir informācija, ko viņa neatklāj, Speids turpina izmeklēt, neapzinoties, ka var kļūt par nākamo upuri.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Napoleona III gāšana no troņa satrauc Vīnes politiskās aprindas. Francim šķiet, ka dēls ir jāsūta uz militāro skolu ātrāk, nekā plānots. Sisi pieņem lēmumu atbrīvot dēlu.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sisi aizbēg no Vīnes kopā ar Rūdolfu un nevēlas atgriezties, kamēr Francis neļaus pašai audzināt dēlu. Abi dodas uz Francijas dienvidiem, kur viņiem izdodas pazust no sabiedrības redzesloka.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Neviens nešķiet pārsteigts, kad pulkvedis Protero tiek atrasts noslepkavots vietējā draudzē. Apkārt ļoti daudz maldinošas informācijas, īpaši, kad atraitne un viņas mīļākais atzīstas slepkavībā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Detektīvs Ficrojs pamana, ka kāds no kolēģiem izmanto nepatiesus pierādījumus, lai apsūdzētu kādu aizdomās turamo. Tā kā Hercogs ir devies projām, viņš nolīgst Elīzu, lai izmeklētu korupciju policijā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir 1940. gada pavasaris, un Skeldeilas namā visus gaida pārmaiņas. Džeimss un Helēna prāto, kad pienāks īstais brīdis ģimenes pieaugumam, nezinot, vai Džeimsu iesauks armijā vai ne. Tristana prombūtni sajūt visi, bet visskarbāk Zigfrīds, kurš cenšas uzturēt pieaugošo mājsaimniecību un braši turēties gaidāmo izaicinājumu priekšā. Uzplaukst Holas kundzes un Helēnas draudzība, abas lūkojas nākotnē. Un ierodas jauns veterinārijas students Ričards Kārmondijs, radot ķibeles mājā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Blackmark
programme.desc: In 1963, military industrialist Arthur Blackmark and a Soviet commander must race against the clock to stop an international nuclear incident which threatens to fire up the Cold War and end the world.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Joel, the owner of an Extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A group of young adults decides to rob a bank, only to discover that the bank is just a front for a Korean mob money laundering operation.

programme.title: Dot.Kill
programme.desc: A detective tries to hunt down a serial killer who broadcasts his murders live on the internet.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Young Jim Hawkins and Peg-legged Long John Silver set sail for adventure in Robert Louis Stevensons classic tale of dastardly pirates, swashbuckling heroes, buried treasure, and a young boys courage during the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Trīs paziņojumi pie Ebingas Misūri štatā
programme.desc: Šī režisora Mārtina Makdona tumši komiska un melnā humora pilnā filma stāsta par kādu Ebingas, Misūri štata iedzīvotāju, kuras meita tiek brutāli nogalināta. Nesagaidot nekādu rīcību no vietējā šerifa un viņa vietnieka, viņa izvieto trīs policijai veltītus stendus pie pilsētas robežām un uzsāk pati savu izmeklēšanu.

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. "Tuvāk" ir stāsts par četriem sākotnēji savstarpēji svešiem cilvēkiem, kurus satuvina acumirklīga iekāre. Nepārvaramajai kaislei seko neuzticība, jo viņi visi ir ļaudis, kuri tic mīlestībai no pirmā acu skatiena. Atkal un atkal.

programme.title: Krutie kruķi
programme.desc: Kāds Londonas policijas seržants tiek pārcelts uz ciematu, kura mierīgie virsnieki iebilst pret viņa dedzību pēc noteikumiem. Tikmēr pilsētu piemeklē šausminošu slepkavību virkne.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: In the final, the teams make alien invasion cakes. Next, 50 cake fans decide which of the six winning cakes will take home the $40,000 grand prize.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jos Faves. Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyere Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Mexican Cuisine. Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.desc: Guy Fieri gets a flavour punch at a Korean-Mexican fusion place in Atlanta, an authentic Thai spot in Dallas and a real-deal Italian joint in Phoenix.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads back to over-the-top arepas in Norwalk, CT, island-inspired chicken wings in Mesa, AZ, and killer kebabs in Dallas.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri grabs seconds of smoked bacon meatloaf in Atlanta, competition-style barbecue in Scottsdale, AZ, and a next-level burger in Fort Worth, TX.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri eats his way through out-of-bounds risotto in Atlanta, real deal relleno in Anthem, AZ, and succulent snapper in Arlington, TX.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena + Moos Craft Barbecue. Selena Gomez tries the best Texas BBQ in Los Angeles at Moos Craft Barbecue. Then, Selena puts her own spin on their meat-centric menu.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Tastes Like Summer. Michael Symon kicks off summer with fried clams with tartar dipping sauce, corn and avocado salad, and Lizs sweet corn panna cotta.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Mango, Pineapple And Pork. Oh My!. Michael Symon heats up the grill for a savoury pork tenderloin marinated in brown sugar, a fruity mango slaw and a thirst-quenching cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Moms All-American Mac. Michael Symon recreates the Greek-American dishes of his childhood, including his mothers pasta, a crispy salad and a mashup of two desserts.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Modiljāni. Trīs dienas uz neprāta spārniem
programme.desc: Pirmā pasaules kara laikā Parīzē bohēmiskais mākslinieks Modiljāni cenšas izvairīties no bumbām, policistiem, draudzenēm un kritiķiem, pieaugošā izmisumā meklējot mājas savai mākslai.

programme.title: Venoms
programme.desc: Reportiera Edija Broka pētījumu lokā ir tēmas, uz ko valdība piever acis. Veicot žurnālistisko izmeklēšanu, Broks nejauši nonāk kontaktā ar ārpuszemes simbiotu, kas pārņem viņa ķermeni. Savienojumā ar simbiotu Broks iegūst superspējas un kļūst par fascinējošo varoni Venomu. Nu viņam jāsadarbojas ar šo parazītisko dzīvības formu ķermenī, lai izglābtu savu dzīvību.

programme.title: Draiskule
programme.desc: Kopš bērnības Eimijas brunčumednieks tēvs ir pārliecinājis viņu, ka monogāmija nav iespējama. Tagad Eimija strādā žurnāla redakcijā un dzīvo ar šādu pārliecību, baudot dzīvi, kas ir brīva no smacējošām, garlaicīgām romantiskajām saistībām, tomēr patiesībā viņa ir iegrimusi rutīnā. Reiz Eimija secina, ka sāk iemīlēties sava jaunā raksta varonī – apburošajā un veiksmīgajā sporta ārstā Āronā Konersā. Tas liek sievietei prātot, vai citi pieaugušie, tostarp šis puisis, kuram ir patiesas simpātijas pret Eimiju, varētu pārliecināt viņu mainīt dzīves filozofiju.

programme.title: Millera meitene
programme.desc: Gotu stila Tenesijas vidusskolas pēdējā kursa skolniece un rakstniece Kairo studē literatūru pie Džonatana Millera, rakstnieka, kurš pievērsās mācīšanai, kad viņa romāni neguva panākumus. Kā grāmatu tārps viņa jau bija izlasījusi viņa uzdoto literatūru, atstājot uz viņu iespaidu. Viņš kļūst par viņas mentoru, un viņi pavada laiku kopā ārpus skolas, apmeklējot rakstīšanas pasākumus. Kairo labākā draudzene lesbiete, kura smejas par flirtēšanu ar skolas treneri, lai iegūtu to, ko vēlas, pārliecina viņu izmantot savu rakstīšanu, lai pavedinātu jau precēto Milleru. Kad Millers uzdod viņai starpposma uzdevumu agrāk nekā citiem, viņa izmanto šo uzdevumu, lai izpaustu savas iekšējās vēlmes par viņu uz papīra, iesaistot abus pretrunīgā situācijā.

programme.title: Teorija par visu
programme.desc: 20. gadsimta 60. gados Kembridžas Universitātes students un topošais fiziķis Stīvens Hokings iemīlas savā studiju biedrē Džeinā Vaildā. Kad Hokingam ir 21 gads, viņam konstatē motorā neirona slimību. Par spīti tam un ar Džeinas palīdzību viņš uzsāk ambiciozu laika izpētes projektu, lai gan puiša ārsts apgalvo, ka laika viņam ir atlicis ļoti maz. Spītējot nelaimei, Stīvens un Džeina izdara jaunus atklājumus medicīnā un zinātnē, sasniedzot vairāk, nekā abi bija spējuši iedomāties.

programme.title: Playmobil. Filma
programme.desc: Animācijas filmas radītājus iedvesmojušas Playmobil rotaļlietas.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Šajā aizraujošajā spriedzes filmā Vina Dīzela un Pola Volkera varoņi no jauna tiekas ar iepriekšējo filmu zvaigznēm. No policijas bēgošais Doms Toreto (Dīzels) Brazīlijā uzmeklē bijušo policistu Braienu OKoneru (Volkers), un abi kļūst par partneriem. Viņiem pa pēdām seko ASV specvienība bīstamā aģenta Feda (Dveins Džonsons) vadībā, kā arī vairāki pērkami policisti, kas strādā nežēlīga narkodīlera uzdevumā. Lai iegūtu brīvību un mierīgu dzīvi, komandai jāpaveic vēl pēdējais uzdevums – jānolaupa 100 miljoni dolāru.

programme.title: Mednieks un ledus karaliene
programme.desc: Ļaunā Ravenna uzzina, ka viņas māsa karaliene Freija gaida mazuli un mīl kādu augstmani. Freija dzemdē meitenīti, bet viņas mīļākais nogalina mazuli un Freijas dusmas atbrīvo ledus spēku, kas nogalina mīļāko. Freija dodas uz ziemeļiem, lai uzbūvētu pili un izveidotu armiju, kura nozog bērnus un izaudzina tos par nežēlīgiem kareivjiem. Paiet gadi, un Ēriks un Sāra ir izauguši un iemīlējušies viens otrā. Viņi plāno aizbēgt no pils, bet Freija starp viņiem uzbūvē ledus sienu. Kādu dienu Sniegbaltīte saslimst, un viņas vīrs meklē Ēriku, lai pateiktu, ka burvju spogulis ir nozagts, kad tika vests uz patvērumu. Ēriks apvienojas ar diviem rūķīšiem, lai atrastu spoguli, taču viņu meklējumi ir saistīti ar briesmām.

programme.title: Dziedi!
programme.desc: Kad viņa teātrim draud slēgšana, uzņēmējdarbībā pieredzējušais koala Basters Mūns (Metjū Makkonahijs) sarīko dziesmu konkursu. Daudziem vietējiem zvēriem tas rada iespēju izpausties. Cūka Rosita (Rīza Viterspūna) ir māte un mājsaimniece, kura atteicās no pusaudža sapņa kļūt par dziedātāju. Pusaudze dzeloņcūka Eša (Skārleta Johansone) ir pancīga roķere alternatīvās mūzikas grupā. Gorillu Džoniju (Tārons Edžertons) viņa tēvs (Pīters Serafinovičs) grib pārliecināt pievērsties savam banku aplaupītāja arodam. Ikkatrs no šiem radījumiem vēlas piepildīt savu sapni un dziedāt no visas sirds!

programme.title: Lils, Lils, Krokodils!
programme.desc: Pēc pārcelšanās uz Ņujorku Primmu ģimene atklāj, ka viņu jaunās mājas bēniņos dzīvo Lils, dziedošs sālsūdens krokodils, kuram garšo kaviārs, patīk iet vannā un klausīties mūziku. Ar Lilu ātri sadraudzējas Primmu dēlēns Džošs, bet, kad krokodila eksistenci apdraud ļaunais kaimiņš, Primmiem jāapvienojas ar Lila harismātisko īpašnieku Hektoru Valenti, lai parādītu pasaulei, ka tajā ir vieta arī lielam, dziedošam krokodilam ar vēl lielāku personību.

programme.title: Līgavu kari
programme.desc: Labākās draudzenes Līva (Keita Hadsone) un Emma (Anna Heteveja) allaž sapņojušas par nevainojamām kāzām slavenajā Ņujorkas viesnīcā "Plaza". Gluži nejauši abu kāzas ieplānotas vienā un tai pašā datumā. Vienai no viņām acīmredzot būs jāizvēlas cita diena, vai ne? Ko vēl ne!

programme.title: Pasaules ieņemšana. Cīņa par Losandželosu
programme.desc: Zemi pārsteidz nezināma ienaidnieka uzbrukums – krīt nepārtraukts milzīgu meteorītu lietus, savā ceļā izpostot visu. Ātri vien kļūst skaidrs, ka pasauli cenšas iekarot citplanētieši. Tiem pretī nekavējoties stājas armija, taču spēki nešķiet samērīgi. Jūras kājinieku seržants Nants jau gatavojās atvaļināties, taču nu tiek nozīmēts uz jaunzveidoto kaujas vienību. Šīs vienības uzdevums ir glābt civiliedzīvotājus, kas ieslodzīti policijas iecirknī citplanētiešu iekarotajā teritorijā. Ir tikai trīs stundas laika, lai paveiktu misiju, jo tad Gaisa spēkiem tiks dota komanda bombardēt šo teritoriju.

programme.title: Rēgu patruļa
programme.desc: Netiešs turpinājums 2013. gada asa sižeta komēdijai. Šoreiz notikumi norisinās 1876. gada Mežonīgajos Rietumos. Pēc neveiksmīga dueļa Šerifs Rojs Pulsifers attopas beigts – viņš nav sajūsmā par šādu pavērsienu, bet viņam dota vēl viena iespēja atgriezties uz zemes ,pievienojoties Rēgu patruļai. Viņa uzdevums – glābt cilvēci no elles.

programme.title: Sliktie kaimiņi
programme.desc: Maks (Sets Rogens) un Kellija (Roza Bairna) gaida otru bērnu un nolemj pārvākties uz citurieni. Viņu plānam traucē Šelbija (Hloja Greisa Moreca), kura mēģina nodibināt studenšu klubu, lai viņa ar draugiem varētu rīkot savas ballītes. Abas grupas drīzumā kļūst par zvērinātiem ienaidniekiem, jo atšķiras to uzskati par skaļu mūziku un nepārtrauktu dzerstiņu. Maks un Kellija drīz sauc palīgā bijušo ienaidnieku Tediju (Zaks Efrons), lai neļautu kubam "Kappa Nu" turpināt traucēt dzīvi apkārtnē.

programme.title: Miljoniem iespēju, kā atdot galus
programme.desc: Filma, kuras darbība norisinās Amerikas rietumos 1882. gadā, vēsta par gļēvo fermeri Albertu (Sets Makfārleins), kura draudzene (Amanda Saifrīda) pamet viņu veiksmīgākā un izskatīgākā bārddziņa dēļ. Alberts vada savas dienas vientulībā un cenšas izvairīties no nāves, taču drīz vien pilsētā nonāk noslēpumainā Anna, kura ātri vien apbur Albertu. Kad pilsētā ierodas viņas vīrs, kurš ir bēdīgi slavens bandīts, Albertam jāsaņem drosme stāties viņam pretī.

programme.title: Maijs decembrī
programme.desc: Pagājuši 20 gadi, kopš 36 gadus vecā Greisija uzsāka romānu ar 13 gadus veco dēla klasesbiedru Džo. Tolaik skandāls tika plaši atspoguļots dzeltenajā presē, bet tagad viņi kopīgi audzina bērnus un izskatās pēc paraugpāra. Laimīgā ģimenes fasāde sāk irt, kad pie viņiem ierodas televīzijas aktrise Elizabete, lai veiktu izpēti savai nākamajai lomai, kurā atveidos Greisiju. Gaismā tiek izcelti nepatīkami fakti par bēdīgi slaveno dēku un uzjundītas sen aizmirstas emocijas.

programme.title: Dzīves garšas
programme.desc: Eiženija ir meistarīga pavāre, kura jau vairāk nekā 20 gadus strādā pie izsmalcināta gardēža Dodēna. Laika gaitā viņu sadarbība pāraugusi romantiskās attiecībās, kas iedvesmo gardus ēdienus, par kuriem sajūsminās pat pasaules izcilākie šefpavāri. Tomēr, neraugoties uz Dodēna uzstājību, Eiženija nesteidzas teikt viņam jāvārdu. Lai mīļoto pārliecinātu, Dodēns nolemj sākt gatavot maltītes viņai.

programme.title: Megamainds pret Iznīcības sindikātu
programme.desc: Megamainda kādreizējā ļaundaru komanda Iznīcības sindikāts ir atgriezusies. Nesen kronētajam varonim Megamaindam nu jāsaglabā ļaundara tēls, līdz viņš varēs apvienot savus draugus, lai apturētu sliktos, kuri vēlas nosūtīt Metropilsētu uz Mēnesi.

programme.title: La La Land. Kalifornijas sapņi
programme.desc: Uz šosejas Losandželosā jauniņā aktrise Mia saķeras ar džeza pianistu Sebastianu. Pēc tam izgāžas arī viņas noklausīšanās lomai. Vakarā Mias istabas biedri aizved viņu uz ballīti, kurā Mia cerēja izklaidēties, taču atklāj, ka viņas mašīna ir aizvesta, tādēļ mājās jādodas ar kājām. Sebastians uzstāšanās laikā restorānā sāk aizrautīgi improvizēt, lai gan īpašnieks ir piekodinājis spēlēt tikai tradicionālās Ziemassvētku dziesmas. Mia ienāk restorānā tieši tajā brīdī, kad Sebastianu atlaiž par nepaklausību. Pēc kāda laika Mia satiek Sebastianu ballītē, kur viņš kopā ar kādu grupu spēlē muzikālo pavadījumu. Pēc pasākuma abi dodas uz savām automašīnām un, ignorējot nepārprotamo pievilkšanos savā starpā, viens par otru zobojas. Viņi satiekas vēl pāris reizes un sāk just viens pret otru simpātijas. Pēc kāda laika viņi abi sāk dzīvot kopā, Mia raksta monolugu vienai aktrisei, bet Sebastians regulāri spēlē džeza klubā. Sebastians sāk spēlēt drauga grupā, kura kļūst publikas iemīļota. Mia un Sebastians sastrīdas grupas pirmās turnejas laikā. Pēc kāda cita liktenīga strīda viņi izšķiras. Mias luga ir neveiksmīga, un, nespēdama samaksāt teātra īri, Mia dodas atpakaļ uz Nevadu. Sebastians saņem zvanu no režisora, kurš aicina Miu uz noklausīšanos. Sebastians pārliecina Miu tur doties. Abi viens otram apsola, ka vienmēr mīlēs viens otru, taču pagaidām nav pārliecināti par kopīgo nākotni. Pēc pieciem gadiem Mia ir precējusies ar citu vīrieti un viņiem ir bērns. Kādu nakti viņi nokļūst džeza bārā, un Mia saprot, ka tas pieder Sebastianam. Sebastians ierauga Miu un nospēlē kopējo mīlas dziesmu. Abi šajā brīdī apcer, kā būtu bijis, ja viņu attiecības būtu nostrādājušas. Pirms Mia dodas prom, viņa uzsmaida Sebastianam.

programme.title: Smurfi
programme.desc: Laipni lūdzam smurfu pasaulē! Burvis Gargamels ir piespiedis smurfus bēgt no dzimtā ciema. Ģimenes komēdija, kurā animācijas filmas varoņi parādās spēlfilmā.

programme.title: Dzīve gada laikā
programme.desc: Kad 17 gadus vecais Darils uzzina, ka viņa draudzene drīzumā varētu nomirt, viņš nolemj viņai sniegt viņas dzīves labāko pieredzi, piedāvājot pilnībā izbaudīt atlikušo gadu, kas viņai palicis šajā saulē.

programme.title: Likteņa ironija
programme.desc: Nekustamo īpašumu aģente Margo un advokāts Grifins varētu būt ideāls pāris, diemžēl abi viens par otra eksistenci pat nenojauš. Turklāt dienu pirms Vecgada vakara Margo un Grifins iesāk ar lielām cerībām – viņiem ir īpaši plāni vakaram ar savām otrajām pusītēm. Taču liktenis visu saliks savās vietās: pēc jautras ballītes ar draugiem taksists Grifinu aizvedīs uz norādīto adresi, tikai... nepareizajā pilsētā! To, ka iekļuvis neīstajā namā, viņš sapratīs vien tad, kad mājās pārnāks Margo.

programme.title: Auniņš Šons. Filma
programme.desc: Kad Šons izlemj veltīt dienu atpūtai un izklaidei, viņu sagaida daudz vairāk piedzīvojumu, nekā viņš būtu gribējis. Pārpratums, kurā iesaistīts fermeris, karavāna un ļoti stāvs kalns, aizved Šonu uz Lielo pilsētu. Tagad Šonam un viņa ganāmpulkam ir jāatrod ceļš atpakaļ mājup, kur viņus gaida māju zaļā zāle.

programme.title: 47 ronini
programme.desc: Kādu dienu medību laikā Ako valdnieks Asano un viņa samuraji mežā atrod kādu vīru un aizved viņu uz pili. Pēc vairākiem gadiem valdnieks Asano rīko turnīru, lai godinātu komandiera ierašanos Ako. Turnīra vakarā valdnieku Asano nobur, lai viņš savainotu Nagato valdnieku Kiru. Komandieris piespriež Asano sodu - pašnāvību. Sapratuši, ka tas bijis valdnieka Kiras ļaunais plāns, samuraji un atradenis, ignorējot komandiera pavēles, dodas atriebties.

programme.title: Greja piecdesmit nokrāsas
programme.desc: Koledžas studente Anastasija Stīla savas saslimušās istabas biedrenes vietā dodas intervēt slaveno uzņēmēju Kristianu Greju universitātes avīzei, taču meitene nenojauš, kā mainīsies viņas dzīve. Noslēpumainajam, bagātajam un ietekmīgajam Kristianam iepatīkas Ana. Lai gan meitenes seksuālā pieredze ir visai niecīga, viņa ļaujas šai dēkai un uzzina, ka Kristiana seksuālās tieksmes pārkāpj sāpju un baudas robežas.

programme.title: Nakts un diena
programme.desc: Vientuļa sieviete lidostā satiek pievilcīgu svešinieku. Sākotnēji šķietami nevainīgā tikšanās pēkšņi apgriež viņas dzīvi ar kājām gaisā, jo svešinieks izrādās slepens spiegs. Džūna tiek ierauta galvu reibinošos piedzīvojumos un bīstamā ceļojumā apkārt pasaulei, jo viņas ceļabiedram ir jāveic ārkārtīgi atbildīga misija un jānosargā baterija, kas var kļūt par mūžīgās enerģijas avotu.
Ir 1917. gada 6. aprīlis. Bruņoto spēku vadība nolemj pretinieka aizmugurē nosūtīt divus kareivjus, kuri, ja izdotos nogādāt ziņu, glābs 1600 vīru no drošas nāves ienaidnieka slazdos.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Pēc pilnīgas izgāšanās slepenajā misijā, kad policists Braiens OKonors atlaiž brīvībā bandas vadoni Dominiku Toreto, viņam tiek dota pēdējā iespēja. Maiami drošības iestādes jau krietnu laiku meklē pierādījumus biznesmeņa Kārtera Verones netīrajam biznesam importa un eksporta darījumu piesegā. Pierādījumu nav, izņemot Verones saistību ar nelegālajām ielu autosacīkstēm. Iefiltrējoties ielu autosacīkšu cienītāju grupā, OKonora uzdevums ir atklāt Verones saikni ar naudas atmazgāšanu, darot to, ko viņš prot vislabāk – plātīties un spiest pedāli grīdā. Taču karstgalvim ir savi noteikumi. Izbrāķējis visus potenciālos slepenās misijas partnerus, OKonors uzstāj par partneri pieņemt viņa bērnības draugu Romenu, kura kriminālā pagātne un mežonīgais autobraukšanas stils ir kā radīti slepenajam uzdevumam.

programme.title: Basketbols: WNBA. Connecticut - Phoenix
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

Futbols: Serie A. Inter - Udinese
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: UFC. Nassourdine Imavov-Caio Borralho
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: FIBA EuroBasket. 1/8 Final. Poland - Bosnia and Herzegovina

programme.desc: Get all the action and cutting edge stories directly from the Arctic Race of Norway, annual multiple stage bicycle race held in northern Norway.

First Home Fix
programme.desc: Design team Raisa Kuddus and Austin Coleman use low-cost, high-impact design and homeowner sweat equity to transform the houses of first-time homebuyers.

programme.title: Down Home Fab
programme.desc: Chelsea and Cole work with corporate clients to morph a hunting lodge into a retreat centre while also pursuing another important, potential client.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: In a quick transformation with no demo required, Joanna creates an indoor garden-feel in the living room, dining room and breakfast nook of a home.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: With her youngest child, Crew, moving to the big kids room, Joanna expands her kitchen into Crews old bedroom and creates the pantry of her dreams.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Pool Kings

programme.title: Down Home Fab
programme.desc: Chelsea and Cole take on the remodel of a couples multimillion-dollar home, and the results could impact their design destiny.

programme.title: First Home Fix
programme.desc: Design team Raisa Kuddus and Austin Coleman use low-cost, high-impact design and homeowner sweat equity to transform the houses of first-time homebuyers.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: A couple taking on their first flip go overboard by gutting a quaint home and planning a large addition. When city permits stall the project, Page steps in.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Married team Kamohai and Tristyn Kalama take on house-flipping projects on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, the most difficult flipping location in the US.

programme.title: Mini Reni
programme.desc: In a quick transformation with no demo required, Joanna creates an indoor garden-feel in the living room, dining room and breakfast nook of a home.

programme.title: Mini Reni

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life
programme.desc: Few places share the magical sparkle of the Mediterranean coastline, with many dreaming of one day purchasing property in this idyllic region. programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Humanity has worshipped the Sun since the beginning of time, and yet even with our modern technology, we still know so little about it. Could unlocking the mysteries of the Sun be the difference between life and death for human civilization?

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The patriotic pals will call on trusted experts to help lay down the law for good deals. Between the events, Chum and Corey get carried away in a massive mansion, and Rick considers a million-dollar memento from a pivotal piece of Americas past.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Ancient lore talks of a Canadian warrior tribe that once terrorised the Nahanni valley, decapitating their enemies. The tribe vanished many years ago, but missing person reports have coincided with eyewitness sightings of ancient soldiers.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: In Search Of Aliens is an American TV series following Giorgio Tsoukalos, a writer, ufologist, television presenter and producer. He is a proponent of the pseudoarchaeological theory that ancient alien astronauts interacted with ancient humans. He takes the viewers on a paranormal journey, suggesting that aliens made contact with primitive humans long time ago and there is such evidence as Indian Sanskrit texts, describing flying machines called Vimanas; Jewish Zohar writings describing a "manna machine" similar to chlorella algae processing of today and many more. He explores the fascinating evidence behind the Earths most famous mysteries.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Missing in Alaska
programme.desc: Ancient lore talks of a Canadian warrior tribe that once terrorised the Nahanni valley, decapitating their enemies. The tribe vanished many years ago, but missing person reports have coincided with eyewitness sightings of ancient soldiers.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: How the Earth Was Made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.
